thread.section_title: Capo d'Africa Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fabulous Location, FANTASTIC Staff
thread.title_full: Fabulous Location, FANTASTIC Staff - Review of Capo d'Africa Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Travel-Mad-Otter
title: Fabulous Location, FANTASTIC Staff
text:
This is a great hotel in Rome, a short walk from the Colosseum and everything that Rome has to offer. The rooms are compact but fabulously furnished. bathrooms are great.
Breakfast is served on the 4th floor and in nice weather can be taken outside.
The real asset to this hotel is it's staff. From check in (a lot of great information provided to us first time visitors to Rome) to the breakfast staff, everyone is super friendly and helpful.
The lovely Victoria behind the bar deserves a special mention... not only is she very friendly and chatty, she also mixes a mean Espresso martini!
We will certainly be back !
